addTypeError: Add type arguments '{{args}}' not of form 'typeName unitName'
badDescription: I could not interpret the description for unit {{name} - {{description}
definitionError: Unit definition {{definition}} not of form: name = value existing_unit
duplicateUnit: Cannot add unit {{name:} as that name is already used
duplicateUnitSet: Cannot add unit set {{name:} as that name is already used
duplicateUnitTypeName: There is already a unit type named {{name}}
exponentError: The term {{term}} has an illegal exponent expression
nameInUse: Cannot add unit {{name}} as that name is already used by standard unit
noOpInCompoundUnit: Unit {{name}} designated COMPOUND, but has no operators
operatorInBase: Cannot have operator in base unit {{name}
parseError: The unit definition {{definition}} could not be parsed into base units correctly
partInvalid: The term {{term}} is a not valid part of a composite unit
setDuplicateDimensions: There is already a type named {{name}} with the same dimensions
setTypeRenameError: Unit set renameTo argument error. Should be 'fromName toName', but was {{args}}
slashError: Unit definition {{definition}} has more than one slash operator
userDefValueError: Bad value in user unit definition {{definition}
unknownUnit: Could not find a unit named {{name}}
?addtype:
usage: addtype typeName unitName
unitName can be a compound unit
?adduserunit:
usage: adduserunit definition
whee definition should be
name = scale * existingUnit
example - workday = 8 h
existingUnit can be a previously undefined compound unit
?cloneset:
usage: clone setName
returns new set name
?listsets:
usage: lists
returns list of unit sets
?listtypes:
usage: listtypes
returns all the types defined in the set
?listuserunits:
usage: listuserunits
returns user added units
?removeuserunit:
usage: remove unitName
removes user added unit named unitName
?unitfortype:
usage: unitfortype typeName
returns the unit for type in the set
